text: Chinese Cemetery is a name given to many cemeteries around the world, generally in English speaking countries that have or had a significant ethnic or immigrant Chinese community. Some notable cemeteries sometimes referred to as "Chinese Cemetery" are: ==Canada== * Chinese Cemetery at Harling Point, in Oak Bay near Victoria, British Columbia ==Pakistan== * Chinese cemetery, Gilgit, Gilgit-Baltistan ==Philippines== * Manila Chinese Cemetery ==United States== * Chinese Cemetery (Idaho), near Warren, Idaho * Chinese Cemetery of Los Angeles, California * Chung Wah Cemetery, Folsom, California
title: Chinese Cemetery
